metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48339 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GNU Emacs through 28.2. htmlfontify.el has acommand injection vulnerability. In the hfy-istext-command function, theparameter file and parameter srcdir come from external input, andparameters are not escaped. If a file name or directory name contains shellmetacharacters, code may be executed.

criterions.comment: xemacs21: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
xemacs21-packages: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
emacs25 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
